courses.title: Powerlifting

courses.description: Tailored program combining cardio, strength training, and nutrition guidance for effective weight loss.

courses.title: Yoga Classes
courses.description: Classes that promote flexibility, strength, and mental relaxation through various yoga postures and breathing exercises.

courses.title: Cardiovascular Training
